welcome.description: At Turkish And Greek Cafe, experience the vibrant flavors of the Mediterranean in a cozy and welcoming environment. From traditional Turkish tea to Greek spanakopita, our menu is made with fresh ingredients and authentic recipes.
welcome.description2: Try our signature Lamb Shank over fragrant basmati rice, or savor housemade falafel with creamy hummus. Every dish is prepared with care and bursting with flavor.
welcome.description3: Don’t miss our Maza Platter or Baklava for an unforgettable finish to your meal.

aboutussection.aboutus: At Turkish And Greek Cafe, we blend the best of Turkish and Greek culinary traditions in Baton Rouge. Our chef-owner takes pride in crafting each dish from scratch using high-quality, fresh ingredients. We offer a warm atmosphere, generous portions, and friendly, attentive service.
aboutussection.aboutus2: From signature gyros and kebabs to vegetarian falafel and tabouli, our menu offers something for everyone. Stop by for dine-in, takeout, or delivery—our goal is to serve you the Mediterranean taste you craved.
